package-manager.name: depot
package-manager.title: XTerm Terminal Emulator
package-manager.description: The xterm program is a terminal emulator for the X Window System. It provides DEC VT102 and Tektronix 4014 compatible terminals for programs that can't use the window system directly. If the underlying operating system supports terminal resizing capabilities (for example, the SIGWINCH signalin systems derived from 4.3bsd), xterm will use the facilities to notify programs running in the window whenever it is resized.
